title: EYL #130 Sports Card Investing, & NFTs feat. Buster Scher
itunes:title: EYL #130 Sports Card Investing, & NFTs feat. Buster Scher
description:
Sports cards are a billion-dollar industry that has gained an influx of notoriety this year with the rise of NBA Top Shot and NFTs. The return on some cards have outpaced the return on stocks, Cryptocurrency, and real estate. Card collections have turned into portfolios for many savvy investors. Cards have sold for millions. Recently, a rare one of one Luka Doncic’s rookie card sold for a record $4.6 million. 


Buster Scher is a young genius. At 20 years old, he runs one of the most influential basketball pages on social media, Hoops Nation. He has 1 million followers on Instagram and 5 million on TikTok. He’s the commentator of Revolt’s crew league, he’s an expert sports card collector, and heads an online community called Card Nation, which is dedicated to sports card collectors. 


In episode 130, we covered the sports card industry, NFTs, online branding, the NBA’s marketing strategy and more. #sportscards #nfts #hoopsnation 


Host IG: https://instagram.com/earnyourleisure?igshid=1xxyi7wafxf7a


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/buster?igshid=8739lewlc578


65% off EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Save 20% on your order of G.O.A.T. Fuel Enter Code: EYL20

https://goatfuel.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
